response.original_title: The Making of the Big Picture
response.overview: Discover the inspiring journey of a group of talented teenagers from Charlotte, NC, as they embark on an artistic adventure. This short documentary, inspired by the work of Teen Health Connection, showcases their collaboration, where these young individuals not only wrote but also performed an incredible play for audiences of all ages. Through candid interviews and behind-the-scenes footage, witness their creativity, passion, and personal growth as they tackle thought-provoking themes and embrace the power of storytelling.
response.title: The Making of the Big Picture
